about_the_game:
Help Ooga to retrieve his stolen food stockpile in this fast-paced, spear-based parkour platformer.

  • Platforming with Spears
  • Intuitive and tight momentum mechanics
  • A massive world with unique area mechanics and enemies
  • Dozens of unlockable OogaBoy levels with unique visuals, locked behind tough movement challenges for the highest skilled Oogas.
  • A cute and loveable protagonist filled with combustible gasses

Play the first world and a half in the free demo, secrets included!
